scripts.lambda::edit: cp lambda/edit.js lambda/index.js && zip -X -r ./edit.zip lambda/* && rm lambda/index.js
scripts.lambda::delete: cp lambda/delete.js lambda/index.js && zip -X -r ./delete.zip lambda/* && rm lambda/index.js
scripts.lambda::list: cp lambda/list.js lambda/index.js && zip -X -r ./list.zip lambda/* && rm lambda/index.js
scripts.lambda::new: cp lambda/new.js lambda/index.js && zip -X -r ./new.zip lambda/* && rm lambda/index.js
